website_summaries.verdict: An excellent option for keeping a small child’s hearing safe while they learn how to properly use volume controls, and a must-have for young Toy Story 4 fans.
cons: Best for little kids, as its maximum volume is fairly soft

customer_reviews.title: Safe for kids
customer_reviews.text: I boughg this for my 2year old. I was sceptical about him bbeing to young to use it cause he might turn up the volume to loud and damage his ears but it actuall not loud and its really comfortable. I love the look, its fun for him. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shamika Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Cutest headphones ever! The Forky on top is such a cute addition and the detail is amazing. He does make them a bit heavy but my son doesn’t mind. I love the volume control to keep his ears safe. They don’t get incredibly loud anyway. They seem to be pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ang D

customer_reviews.title: Great Price Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Work like they should. Buttons are easily accessible and easily worked by a children. My son is 2 and a half and can connect it himself. They are not really adjustable other than maybe a size or two sizes bigger. The ear area seems large for headphones geared at children. They stay on the head though so they are a keeper for our house. If your kiddo has a hard time with hats this might not be the headset for you.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: It's just alright
customer_reviews.text: It's o.k. wasn't horrible or anything but not quite as advertised. It makes cool sounds and lights up. It doesn't work exactly like lazer tag. You have to actually hit the other persons gun with your laser instead of a wearable target. It doesnt always keep track. I was underwhelmed. Its probably really fun for 3 and 4 year olds. It does look cool lit up and will make sound everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this thing! I bought coordinating headphones, the toy story Forky headphones. Now my 3yo son and 5yo daughter fight over who gets to use it. I stream music through my phone via Amazon music, eventually I will load some songs on there. The sound quality was better than I was expecting, but it is still just a kids toy, so it's no JBL. It was a major mom win! I'll be getting another for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: WashingtonApple

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses them with the kids fire tablet. She’s 4, thinks they’re super cute, and can adjust them herself.
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears these to watch movies or play games on her tablet in the car. I assume they are comfortable because she wears them a lot. They don't fit me since they are made for kids, so I can't say for myself. I like that it has volume control so I can be sure that my daughter won't blow her ear drums with the volume.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great head phones but....
customer_reviews.text: These head phones were great. They connected easily to iPad through blue tooth, volume controlled through iPad has never been a problem. Fun toy story design, my three year old loves them. My only complaint is they are fragile. I accidentally dropped them on the floor about a month after using them and the headband broke. I tapped them back together and they are still working 2 weeks later but I worry it’s just a matter of time before they bite the dust. For the money I guess I can’t complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does Not work on Kindles
customer_reviews.text: I had asked if it was Kindle friendly and was assured it was. It is not. They do not work at all. This was a completely useless purchase for me. Twenty bucks down the drain. VERY disappointed. And then, a second item I ordered and paid for at the same time was not even in the box. Amazon is slipping up quite a lot lately.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Useless!
customer_reviews.text: The first time we bought this, the entire back of it was missing. I contacted Amazon and they sent a new one right away and we sent in the first one. The second one worked TWICE. Now it won’t even turn on. We’ve charged it, even tried different cables/outlets but it won’t even flash on. HUGE waste of money, ended up costing us $40 and a sad toddler.
customer_reviews.author: kriso

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered a pair and even had to order a replacement there not really durable or reliable the first set I figured okay maybe it’s just defective but the second set has lost sound in one ear already after I only a few uses you figure that these being kid headphones they’d last will not be buying again total waste of money and time!!
customer_reviews.author: victoria salinas

customer_reviews.title: Cute but no sound
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely cute but my nephew has listened to them maybe 3 times and each time, there sounds like it’s a shortage in the wires. I would not recommend these. They’re cute but that’s all.
customer_reviews.author: punkin

customer_reviews.title: Run small, and break
customer_reviews.text: I do not know if my 5 year old has a big head or what but these were too small for him. After the first week of school his teacher returned these because the plug part broke and i believe got stuck inside on of the school electronics, yikes! So as cute as these were do not buy these if your kid has a big head or for school.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Reza

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy but good for first headphones
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because its a toy story theme. Our youngest loves toy story. The headsets are very flimsy meaning they tend to fall off very easily. Even after adjusting them. The sound control works really well though. Overall its fine for a first headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Cute but maybe not entirely functional
customer_reviews.text: All in all, they’re pretty cute. But the big Forky on top is so heavy that when my son is looking down at his iPad, the headphones keep sliding forward and falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P.

customer_reviews.title: Falls off easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. He loved the look but it kept falling off of his head. He’s 4 and it fits buts fall off of his head easily. I think the weight of forky causes it to slide down. He is no longer interested in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love these because they don’t shoot anything out like other similar toys. Makes sounds with lights. My kids love them
customer_reviews.author: Gingersnap33

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandson so he can listen to his things on my iPad and I must say they are super cute. The ear padding is comfortable and he can control the volume. It's not too old for his ears and i like the fact that the volume is controlled and the head band is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Bo

customer_reviews.title: Headphone ear cushion came loose, unable to reattach.
customer_reviews.text: Wireless headphone was very easy to connect, but the left headphone ear cushion came off, seem like it was glue on and i was unable to reattach.
customer_reviews.author: Danny f.

customer_reviews.title: Toy Story headphones didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: My son borrowed a pair of kid Toy Story headphones so I decided to buy him a pair. He was very frustrated when he first used them. He said “Mom, these don’t work”. “I can’t hear”. I tried them on and I could barely hear and it was staticky. Very bummed these didn’t work out. My husband through away the package so I’m sure I can’t return. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Head phons
customer_reviews.text: It is so cute but better then that you can’t hear what there listening too
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Berger

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters are having a blast
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is rechargeable - my grandaughters love it. Turn the radio away from the one holding the mic so it won't squeal
customer_reviews.author: Persnickety periwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son absolutely loves this headphones!! They are perfect for toddlers and are super cute. I also like the fact that it comes with a volume control feature for parents. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: C&K

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: My son is into Toy Story everything right now and especially forky! These headphones are awesome for any kids into Toy Story. My son was ecstatic and couldn’t wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewreader

customer_reviews.title: Yellow cloth came off
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for his birthday and the first pair he would leave on. However, the yellow covering for the ears has already worked it's way out after only wearing twice. I can't get that cloth back in the spot. So I doubt they will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Baylis

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver...
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and fits my 4-yr old perfectly. They are not too big and uncomfortable. The volume is controlled so it is not too loud for the little ones and they are a wireless bluetooth device. EXCELLENT PRICE FOR THE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: dymond.lilly

customer_reviews.title: Cute but bit the dust
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVED these Forky headphones, cute and the sound was pretty good. However, we got them for him for Christmas and by the end of February they were dead. He has taken very good care of them so must be some kind of electrical problem.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Smith

customer_reviews.title: My child with autism APPROVES!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son win who is Autistic and he absolutely loves them. Once those headphones are on he can't hear much outside of them. I'm not sure if these headphones are meant to be noise cancelling, however they do the job fairly well for my son. He either wears them while playing his video game or when we go out in public to help with his hypersensitivity. He was so happy to get them on his 7th birthday. My son loves them!
customer_reviews.author: CiCi Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality and fragile
customer_reviews.text: It lasted for only 1 use and now they are in the trash, after the first use, the volume limit control was not working properly, the first limit was not even audible, the max allowed volume was barely audible, the cable started to have false contact so not even resisted one use, please invest in something good, I knew this was a cheap product but I didn’t expect it that cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 5 year old.. HE LOVES THEM.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old gets a LOT of use out of these perfect head phones. Perfectly made.. great sound. Got 2 pr.. one for 1pad.. 1 for vehicle TV. AND THEY WORK GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: paula watson

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love this
customer_reviews.text: This was for my grandson as a replacement. His first one the cord broke... not sure how or who did this... so this was a replacement. He wears it when he plays on his iPad.
customer_reviews.author: LPollaro

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 and he is autistic and he loves these! This is his second pair bc the dog chewed up the first pair he got for his birthday in Aug. So I got his a new pair for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: mab_710

customer_reviews.title: Cute !
customer_reviews.text: Love the volume control ! A tiny bit to big for my 3 year old but she loves them !

customer_reviews.title: Cute.

customer_reviews.author: Reviewmama

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This worked great. Loved the volume control feature. Unfortunately my 4 year old broke the adapter part. I would buy this again for her. But with supervision next time lol

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, product was in excellent condition when it arrived, and my 2 1/2 year old loves it! And I love the parental volume control as well!

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones for the younger ones!

customer_reviews.title: Small

customer_reviews.title: Cute headphones.

customer_reviews.title: I love the parental volume control option

I purchased this at a very good price ($14.99) but noticed it went up about $5.00 shortly after I did. Even if the price was more when I purchased it, I still would have done it.

product_meta.title: Kids Headphones for Kids Toy Story 4 Forky Adjustable Stereo Tangle-Free 3.5Mm Jack Wired Cord Over Ear Headset for Children Parental Volume Control Kid Friendly Safe Perfect for School Home Travel
product_meta.description: Color:Forky HeadphonesThe new Disney toy story 4 fork kid friendly headphones are here! ! listen to whatever you like In safety, comfort, and style. These high quality headphones are equipped with a volume limiting switch to ensure safe sound levels for kids. The cool toy story 4 fork graphics are perfect for your little hero. Plug in your audio device and listen to anything you want. The pivoting ear cushions and adjustable headband provide comfort and quality so you can enjoy your music for as long as you like. This will make the perfect gift or birthday present for your little one!. Features: volume limiting switch connects to any audio device adjustable headband pivoting ear cushions toy story 4 fork graphics perfect gift order now! !
feature_bullets: Parental control: These headphones come equipped with an adjustable volume limiter to provide a safe and optimal listening experience for iOS and/or Android users. (See back of packaging for more details)
Connectivity: connect to any audio device with the line-in jack and listen to whatever you like.
Performance: Enter a world of your own and enjoy crisp quality sound from the makers of home.
Comfort & quality: padded pivoting ear cushions and an adjustable headband allows for a comfortable custom fit.
Perfect gift: this will make the perfect gift or birthday present for your little one!
